page.title: 14Deanshanger Teenagers (cont)
page.content: Of the world at large ,they said they were disappointed with present world leaders.They held them responsible for famine,war,pollution and the nuclear threat .In general they were not concerned all the time about world issues ,but they did talk about them now and then.They felt that there future security and happiness would be most affected by their chances of getting a good job.They saw the problems of unemployment and had lost their youth club as a result of it.Some of them felt they had a better than average chance of getting a job because of the expanding city near by.They saw another side of their happiness the result of a warm family,and hoped to have succesful marriage.They seemed to be a thoughtful group of children who were able to be positive about their future.
